name: vscode-dotnet-runtime
author: Microsoft Corporation
description: Allows acquisition of the .NET runtime specifically for VSCode extension authors.

scripts.vscode:prepublish: npm run compile-all && npm install && webpack --mode production
scripts.compile-all: cd vscode-dotnet-runtime-library && npm install &&  npm run compile && cd .. && cd vscode-dotnet-runtime-extension && npm install &&  npm run compile && cd ..
